name: PaissaHouse
description:
This Discord bot can display housing information for the MMORPG Final Fantasy XIV (FFXIV, FF14).

You can filter and display data from PaissaDB directly in Discord, making it easier to share it with friends.

You can also set up a text channel within your server to receive announcements when a new lottery phase begins.

**Commands**

* /paissa [datacenter] [world] → Use this command to find housing information for a data center and world of your choice. You can further filter it within the command using the optional parameters. You can filter it by:
  * [district] → Housing District (Mist, The Lavender Beds, The Gauntlet, Shirogane, Empyreum)
  * [size] → Plot Size (Small, Medium, Large)
  * [lottery-phase] → Current Phase (Accepting Entries, Results, Unavailable, FCFS, Missing/Outdated)
  * [allowed-tenants] → Who can enter the lottery (Free Company, Individual)
* /help → Information about the bot, transparency, commands and the deployment hash.

permissions.name: View Channels
permissions.reason: Required to see which channels the bot can post housing updates to.

permissions.name: Send Messages
permissions.reason: Needed to send housing information and respond to commands.

permissions.name: Embed Links
permissions.reason: Used to display housing data in rich, formatted embeds for better readability.

permissions.name: Use External Emojis
permissions.reason: Allows the bot to use custom emojis to enhance the visual presentation of housing information.
